BEATEN CHANA – PROTEIN RICH Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Indian OIL-FREE Healthy snack: Here goes desi chana – in the pressed form (chana jor) with tangy masala on a fun ride together with the mission of delighting your taste buds. Be prepared, for you can never have enough!

Ingredients: Beaten Chickpea (chana), Spices Mix (Black Pepper, Cumin seed, Clove, Asafoetida, Amla, Dry Mango Powder, Aniseed, Dry Ginger, Cinnamon, Laungi Mirch, Tartaric, Salt (rock, black, iodized)).

Shelf Life: 4 months.
Ready-to-eat snack
Shipping: Ships in 1-2 working days.

item.title: BERRIES MIX
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: - Rich in anti-oxidants: Berries are known to be a great source of antioxidants and essential vitamins helping in boosting immunity. - Fibre-rich: A small portion of this snack creates feelings of fullness, reduces appetite: a smart way to keep calories in check. - Good for weight-loss: The fiber content helps in reducing the appetite and eventually helping in weight loss. - Roasted, oil-free and sugar-free snack: A package of all things healthy!
item.content:encoded:
Roasted, Oil-free, ready-to-eat Trail Mix: What is it that you get when cranberries, black currant & raisins decide to be friends with flax, muskmelon, and pumpkin seeds? A berry-berry enjoyable experience!

Ingredients: Flaxseeds, Muskmelon seeds, Green Pumpkin seeds, Red Cranberry, Black Cranberry Black Raisin, Black Currant.

Shelf Life: 4 months.
Shipping: Ships in 1-2 working days.
